segments.text: These two sections need to be re-written , Jerry . The last guy that did this really mixed things up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I could tell that . That ’ s no problem . I can probably get it re-done by tomorrow . When ’ s our meeting with the boss ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not until next week , I think , the 15th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , we ’ Ve got plenty of time .
